item.title: Habit Reminder
item.description: Introduction PCB design has been something I’ve wanted to learn for a while now, and instead of reading extensively into the topic, I thought the best way to learn was to dive into a simple project and get my hands dirty. I thought up a fairly simple concept for a ‘habit reminder’ with a configurable screen to display tasks and completion status as well as satisfying tactile buttons for when the task is completed.
